bullets: Developed and deployed a RESTful API service using Flask to handle internal data requests, reducing manual data retrieval time by 40%
Collaborated with 3 senior engineers to migrate legacy Java code to a modern microservices architecture
Wrote comprehensive unit tests using JUnit, increasing code coverage from 65% to 85% for the payments module
Analyzed 50GB+ of sensor data using Python (Pandas/NumPy) to identify patterns in IoT device usage
Built a data visualization dashboard using React that allowed researchers to monitor real-time experiment metrics
Presented findings at the Annual Undergraduate Research Symposium to an audience of 200+ faculty and students

projects.title: StudyBuddy Mobile App
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile app for organizing study groups. Implemented real-time chat and push notifications, reaching 500+ student users within 2 months.
bullets: Built cross-platform mobile app with real-time chat reaching 500+ users

projects.title: Algorithm Visualizer
projects.description: Interactive web tool visualizing sorting and pathfinding algorithms. Used by 2 professors as a teaching aid for Intro to CS classes.
bullets: Created interactive algorithm visualization tool used by professors in CS courses
